list_definition.definition: (a kind of hairstyle with the) hair tied in a bunch at the back of the head

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Angela wears her hair in a ponytail.

list_ex_of_english: After dropping them off and cutting off his frequently ridiculed ponytail, he arrives at the show in the interval.
She wears eyeglasses and has purple hair like her brother, tied in a high ponytail decorated in a bow.
He has brown hair in a ponytail and wears a red shirt and a black trenchcoat.
She has from two to three ponytails sticking from her hair.
She has freckles and two ponytails that are always uneven, one significantly higher than the other one, just like her socks.
He is also noticeable due to the long reddish ponytail he sports as the only hair on his head.
Always keeps her hair in a ponytail, usually wears a jinbei, with kanji representing her emotions at the moment, over casual clothing at home.
Watsuki described her ponytail hairstyle as "de rigueur" for a girl who practices kendo.
